授業目的: The main objective is to improve students' ability to discuss educational issues in English.The secondary objective is to improve their active vocabulary.
到達目標: By the end of the course, students should be able to discuss, give their opinions on and present on the issues raised inthe course.
授業方法: Class will normally begin with warmup questions about recent events and the weather. There will be ample opportunity for pair and group work.

第1回: Introductions; First Semester - Discussion Questions (two rounds) ; instructor's schedule; Department of Education Helps Students With Disabilities - model read.
Review. Students with DIsabilities - read & look up vocabulary.
第2回: First Semester - Discussion Questions (one round). Students with Disabilites -read aloud & chorus (short segments). Vocabulary Matching Exercises.
Students with Disabilities - Vocabulary Matching Exercises
第3回: Students With Disabilities - read aloud & chorus (long segments). Vocabulary Matching Exercises.
第4回: Students With Disabilities -(students read aloud in turns). Comprehension  Questions.
第5回: Students With Disabilities -(students read aloud in turns).  Discussion Questions.
Drag is never appropriate for kids
第6回: Drag is never appropriate for kids - read aloud & chorus. Vocabulary Matching Exercises I & II.
Drag is never appropriate for kids - Comprehension & Discussion Questions.
第7回: Drag is never appropriate for kids  - students read aloud in turns. Comprehension & Discussion Questions.
第8回: Drag is never appropriate for kids  - students read aloud in turns.  is never appropriate for kids  - students read aloud in turns. Dictation Practice. Comprehension Questions.
第9回: Drag is never appropriate for kids  - students read aloud in turns. Dictation practice.
第10回: Drag is never appropriate for kids  - students read aloud in turns. Dictation practice.
第11回: Drag is never appropriate for kids  - students read aloud in turns.  first listening tests.
第12回: The 'Infamous 96' Know Firsthand What Happens When Affirmative Action Is Banned - read aloud & chorus (short segments).     Vocabulary Matching Exercise I.
第13回: First listening test.  The 'Infamous 96' Know Firsthand What Happens When Affirmative Action Is Banned - read aloud & chorus (short segments).     Vocabulary Matching Exercises.
第14回: Return first listening tests. The 'Infamous 96'  - read aloud & chorus (short segments). Vocabulary Matching Exercise I.
第15回: Makeup (supplementary class. Review of May 31  or week 7 material.  of Fall Term Discussion Questions - two rounds. Go over revised syllabus. The 'Infamous 96' Know Firsthand What Happens When Affirmative Action Is Banned - read aloud & chorus (short segments).     Vocabulary Matching Exercises.
第16回: Start of Fall Term DIscussion Questions (two rounds). The 'Infamous 96' Know Firsthand What Happens When Affirmative Action Is Banned - read aloud & chorus (long segments).     Vocabulary Matching Exercises II - V.
第17回: The 'Infamous 96' Know Firsthand What Happens When Affirmative Action Is Banned - model read.
第18回: The 'Infamous 96'  - read aloud & chorus (short segments). Vocabulary matching exercises I, II & III.
第19回: The 'Infamous 96'  - read aloud & chorus (long segments). Vocabulary matching exercises IV & V.
第20回: God & grades  - model read. Vocabulary Matching Exercise.
第21回: God & grades & grades - read aloud & chorus (short segments) Comprehension Questions
第22回: God & grades & grades - read aloud & chorus (long segments). Cloze. Discussion Questions
第23回: Group presentations - choose groups. God & grades & grades - students read aloud in turns. Cloze. Discussion Questions.
第24回: Group presentations - choose roles.  Oh, the things AI can do - model read.  Vocabulary Matching Exercise.
Choose topics. Oh, the things AI can do - Vocabulary Matching Exercise.
第25回: Group presentations - choose topics. Choose topics. Oh, the things AI can do - read aloud and chorus (short segments). Vocabulary Matching Exercise.
Choose dates. Oh, the things AI can do - Comprehension Questions.
第26回: Group presentations - choose dates. Oh, the things AI can do - read aloud and chorus (long segments). Comprehension Questions.
Prepare for presentations. Oh, the things AI can do - Discussion Questions.
第27回: Group presentations. Oh, the things AI can do - students read aloud in turns. Cloze exercise. Discussion Questions.
第28回: Group Presentations. Oh, the things AI can do - students read aloud in turns. Cloze exercise. Discussion Questions.

学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
